ja329:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja329:1.1_0: “They get to know whether a person has nothing,
ja329:1.3_0: We must go to the next life, Rādha;
ja329:1.4_0: and I’m able to get wealth.
ja329:2.2_0: and to those who praise suffering,
ja329:3.3_0: How is I able to see that bull elephant?
ja329:4.1_0: if she makes a hut, but it’s earned by the ear,
